summary: SummaryMAC Lustreglass Sheer-Shine Lipstick is sheer perfection. Experience glamour with a revamped sheer, and shiny formula. It delivers translucent, glossy color with nourishing ingredients. Enjoy buildable color, a long-wearing, lustrous finish, and smoother lips. Its silky texture glides effortlessly.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides immediate and long-term moistureConditions lips instantly and over timeLips look visibly fuller and healthier immediatelyLipstick helps lips feel softer, smoother and more suppleFeaturesLong-wearing color, 8 hoursLong-wearing shine, 6 hoursLightweight, buildable lipstick coverageComfortable formulaWeightless feelKey IngredientsJojoba, Raspberry Seed, Coconut and Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oils: Nourishes LipsShea Butter: Conditioner LipsHyaluronic Acid: Moisturizes LipsItem 2635500How To UseApply lipstick directly to lips.IngredientsDiisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyethylene, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Polybutene, Silica, Ozokerite, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax\Candelilla Cera\Cire De Candelilla, Octyldodecanol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ceramide Ng, Tribehenin, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Titanium/Titanium Dioxide, Alumina, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Peg-10 Phytosterol, Linoleic Acid, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Phytosteryl Isostearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Vanillin, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Bronze Powder (CI 77400), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470), Copper Powder (CI 77400), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 21 (CI 45380), Red 27 (CI 45410), Red 28 (CI 45410), Red 30 (CI 73360), Red 33 (CI 17200), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), reviews.headline: This color ♡♡
reviews.comments: I am obsessed with Mac lipstick and Alone time is my favorite so far! I am buying another so I have a backup. Its the perfect shade! I have very fair, cool toned skin. ♡♡

reviews.headline: This is my new favorite.
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this color and it's shine.

reviews.headline: Beautiful shade for cooler toned folks
reviews.comments: Feels great and the shade is perfect

reviews.headline: I love this lip for cool toned girls
reviews.comments: I have a neutral pallet but I love how cool toned makeup looks on me, so this is perfect. It reads as a kind of muted brownish nude. Lasts so long and the formula is comfy

reviews.headline: Great lipstick
reviews.comments: I love the color on me and it doesn't make my lips dry after a few hours. I would recommend it

reviews.headline: Lasts and lasts
reviews.comments: The color matches an old YSL lipstick I have.  It stayed on after lunch, afternoon, evening!  WITHOUT REAPPLYING.   It didn't come off on classes at all.

reviews.headline: Beautiful color but
reviews.comments: I love the color! Syrup is such a great shade, however when I went to apply it for the second time, it broke. It's brand new and the top just broke off. I didn't put it on harshly or anything it was just very very soft.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: This lipstick is terrific. It glides on so smoothly and it looks sensational. I got the Sellout shade and absolutely live. It is a very pretty shade of pink.

reviews.headline: I LOVE IT !
reviews.comments: I LOVE IT ! it has little sparkles. Silky texture and the color is Great!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love this lipstick. I love the satin finish. It's sheer but buildable, for more subtle or bold color. I got the Hug Me shade which is perfect for me bc i have a neutral tone and pale skin. I also love the sleek iconic mac bullet packaging :) I've been wanting it for a while now.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing
reviews.comments: Such a great lipstick. I've always had matte lipsticks but this time I decided to go for a change. It really moisturizes my lips. I can reapply all I want. It is a nude color for my tan skin and it looks great. It brings out my inner latina and I love it. Would definitely try more.

reviews.headline: Great color
reviews.comments: This is my first lustreglass lipstick. I would not say this has much of a shine to it, but I do love the color(alone time). I top it with a gloss when I want it to to be more glass like. I would also say it's not long wearing, and it has a vanilla scent to it.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: It has a good shine

reviews.headline: I would purchase this product again and again!
reviews.comments: I have used this lipstick for 19 years.  I Love it.  I hope this lipstick is never discontinued.

reviews.headline: Third tube
reviews.comments: This is a favorite lip color for me. I love it and will keep wearing it forever.

reviews.headline: Loooving Thanks, It's Mac!
reviews.comments: I purchased Thanks, It's Mac! and I am loving the color. I'm light cool neutral toned, and this color looks like my lip color but better. It's perfect for a no makeup makeup look and adds a little sparkle. Lusterglass are my favorite, but you will have to reapply,  which I don't mind.

reviews.headline: Wrong shade for me
reviews.comments: I just didn't like the shade for me, however I love Mac lipstick and do recommend their product.

reviews.headline: Lips Feel Moisturized
reviews.comments: I purchased the color Alone Time and have been wearing it almost daily. It's a purpley brown, all around great nude for someone with a cool undertone. I like that it applies light, but you can build it up. The only thing is that I have to reapply every few hours, but I'm enjoying that it feels like a balm on my lips!

reviews.headline: Best lipstick
reviews.comments: I bought the Mac luster glass lipstick in shade sell-out. It is a beautiful pinky color I love it!

reviews.headline: Product is nice
reviews.comments: Although the product is nice, I decided to return it because I wasn't thrilled with the color.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Let me preface this review by saying that I tend to use almost exclusively drugstore products, and it takes quite a bit for me to get excited about anything more high end than, say, L'oréal. That being said, I am in LOVE with Blankety. I've been searching for a lipstick that's a match for my natural lip color for a while now, and until now the closest I've gotten was NYX's Stone. Blankety is, quite literally, exactly the same shade as my natural lips, and the formula is incredibly comfortable and moisturizing.

1000% holy grail status A++++ 11/10 do recommend for ultra-pasty folks who can't find a "nude" lip that isn't too orange, pink, or dark
faceoff_positive.headline: Blankety < 3

faceoff_negative.comments: I have ordered this lipstick in the past, and it was a very soft coral; just as the description says. The last time I ordered, the color was very different; more of a rose, much darker than the one I had last. Very disappointed in the color and very disappointed in M.A.C. quality control.
faceoff_negative.headline: Color discrepancie
